intra_panel_references.logic_description: IF India is selected in 'Select the process type' then value is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT

rule_conditions.condition: Select the process type = India
Select the process type = International

intra_panel_references.logic_description: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field as 2nd column of reference table 1.3

rule_conditions.condition: Account Group/Vendor Type is selected
rule_conditions.action: Filter dropdown values from reference table 1.3 column 2

intra_panel_references.logic_description: If account group/vendor type is ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE then derived as Domestic. If ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS then derived as Import

rule_conditions.condition: Account Group/Vendor Type IN (ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE)
Account Group/Vendor Type IN (ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS)

intra_panel_references.logic_description: If Select the process type is India then country is India and Non-editable. If International then country is selectable dropdown

rule_conditions.condition: Select the process type = India
rule_conditions.action: Set value to 'India', make field non-editable

rule_conditions.condition: Select the process type = International
rule_conditions.action: Enable dropdown selection from reference table 1.1

intra_panel_references.logic_description: If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

rule_conditions.action: Derive country name from reference table 1.1 column 5

rule_conditions.condition: Country is selected
rule_conditions.action: Derive country code from reference table 1.1 column 2

intra_panel_references.logic_description: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2

rule_conditions.condition: Process Type is set
rule_conditions.action: Filter dropdown values from reference table 1.2 where column 1 matches Process Type

rule_conditions.condition: Country is selected

intra_panel_references.source_logic: If "Yes" then TDS certificate upload field is mandatory. If "No", field will be hidden. Upload size is 15 Mb

referenced_fields.reference_description: Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory when Duplicate GST Result indicates a duplicate
Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory when Duplicate PAN Result indicates a duplicate
Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory when Duplicate Email Result indicates a duplicate
Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory when Duplicate Mobile Result indicates a duplicate
Exception Duplicate Vendor creation becomes mandatory when Duplicate Bank Account Number Result indicates a duplicate

intra_panel_references.logic_source: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)

referenced_fields.reference_description: Justification is logically required when Exception Duplicate Vendor creation checkbox is checked

intra_panel_references.logic_source: Implied from field naming convention - justification for the exception

intra_panel_references.condition: If 'Is Vendor Your Customer?' = YES, then 'Customer Code' is visible and mandatory; else hidden
intra_panel_references.raw_logic: If YES, then visible and mandatory, else hidden. (Need discussion on the logic. Can we derive using a dropdown field)
